description: This course is fully designed keeping new and intermediate learners in mind, especially those who are looking for a correct and safe method to learn trading. Classes will be conducted according to a fixed schedule, where each session will include live chart analysis, step-by-step teaching methods, and strategies that can be applied in real markets. The start and end dates of the course are clearly defined so that students can manage their time easily. Each class will be held at a specific time every day, and every lesson will be available in recorded form, allowing students to rewatch anytime.

Additionally, the course includes complete study materials, practice charts, custom indicators, and trading tools—making the learning experience even easier and more effective. The course fee is affordable and with a one-time payment, students will get full access to the entire course along with all future updates for free. By the end of the course, learners will have a strong trading foundation and will be able to trade confidently with minimal risk.
This course is designed in such a way that even a complete beginner can easily analyze charts, create their own strategy, and trade safely by minimizing risks.
